creator: asf-bugzilla-2006@abstrakt.de
text:
The download links on http://lenya.apache.org/ contain the reference to their
MD5 checksums in order to check the integrity of the downloaded archive.
However, as the checksum links also point to the mirrors, they are of no value:
Mirrors providing bogus download files could as well provide their own correct MD5.

They should point to the central apache download site, e.g.
http://www.apache.org/dist/lenya/SOURCES/apache-lenya-2.0-src.tar.gz.md5 in
order to provide value.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Fixed in docu svn 627042. Thank you for reporting. Someone needs to run forrest
to update our site.
